description: boats near shore with steep embankment up to buildings at upper right; steps up embankment at center

ULC, in pencil: [188/2]
markings: LLC, in purple: [S / H] collector\'s stamp of Dr. Heinrich Stinnes, Lugt 1376a

title: La Seine du Bas-Meudon
